sen.cmt: 對馬三郎: 定訳不明
sen.e: The third son MINAMOTO no Yoshiyasu, Tsushima no Saburo.
sen.cmt: Yoshi→Yoshiyasu、對馬三郎→Tsushima no Saburoに修正、スペース修正、カンマ・ピリオド追加しました。
sen.e: The third son MINAMOTO no Yoshiyasu, Tsushima no Saburo.

sen.j: 民部丞、伊予介。
sen.e: Minbu no jo, Iyo no suke (assistant governor of Iyo Province)
Minbu no jo (Secretary of Ministry of Popular Affairs), Iyo no suke (Assistant Governor of Iyo Province).
sen.cmt: Minbu no joの補足追加 (参照: http://www.albany.edu/eas/205/rank%20chart.htm)、assistant governor→Assistant Governorとし、ピリオド追加しました。
sen.e: Minbu no jo (Secretary of Ministry of Popular Affairs), Iyo no suke (Assistant Governor of Iyo Province).

sen.j: 四男 源義行 對馬四郎。
sen.e: The forth son MINAMOTO no Yoshiyuki 對馬四郎
sen.cmt: 對馬四郎: 定訳不明
sen.e: The fourth son MINAMOTO no Yoshiyuki, Tsushima no Shiro.
sen.cmt: fourthのスペルミス修正、對馬四郎→Tsushima no Shiroとし、カンマ・ピリオド追加、スペース修正しました。
sen.e: The fourth son MINAMOTO no Yoshiyuki, Tsushima no Shiro.

sen.j: 兵庫允、伊予介。
sen.e: Hyogo no jo, Iyo no suke (assistant governor of Iyo Province)
Hyogo no jo (officer of the Bureau of Military Storehouses), Iyo no suke.
sen.cmt: Hyogo no joの補足追加、Iyo no suke→既出のため補足削除、スペース修正、ピリオド追加しました。
sen.e: Hyogo no jo (officer of the Bureau of Military Storehouses), Iyo no suke.

sen.j: 五男 源為義 六条判官。
sen.e: The fifth son MINAMOTO no Tameyoshi Rokujo-no-Hangan
The fifth son MINAMOTO no Tameyoshi, Rokujo no Hangan.
sen.cmt: カンマ・ピリオド追加、Rokujo no Hanganのハイフン消去しました。
sen.e: The fifth son MINAMOTO no Tameyoshi, Rokujo no Hangan.

sen.j: 左衛門大尉、検非違使。
sen.e: Saemon no daijo (Senior Lieutenant at the Left Division of Outer Palace Guards), kebiishi (officials with judicial and police powers)
Saemon no daijo (Senior Lieutenant at the Left Division of Outer Palace Guards), Kebiishi (officials with judicial and police powers).
sen.cmt: kebiishi→Kebiishiとし、ピリオド追加しました。
sen.e: Saemon no daijo (Senior Lieutenant at the Left Division of Outer Palace Guards), Kebiishi (officials with judicial and police powers).

sen.j: 六男 源宗清 従五位下伊勢守、兵庫允。
sen.e: The sixth son MINAMOTO no Munekiyo Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Ise no kami (Governor of Ise Province), Hyogo no jo
The sixth son MINAMOTO no Munekiyo, Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Governor of Ise Province, Hyogo no jo.
sen.cmt: カンマ・ピリオド追加、Governor of Ise Provinceとしました。
sen.e: The sixth son MINAMOTO no Munekiyo, Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Governor of Ise Province, Hyogo no jo.

sen.j: 源氏を継いだ為義は、他の兄弟とは不仲であったようである。
sen.e: Tameyoshi succeeded heir of Minamoto clan but he didn't get along with other brothers and the brothers didn't joined the Hogen War, the Heiji War and raising an army by Minamoto clan, they lived in Kyoto and spend their life as bureaucracy.
Tameyoshi succeeded heir of the Minamoto clan but he did not get along with other brothers.
sen.cmt: 「一原文一訳文の例外対処」the Minamoto clan、didn't→did notとしました。
sen.e: Tameyoshi succeeded to the Minamoto clan but he did not get along with his other brothers.

sen.j: 他の兄弟は保元の乱、平治の乱をはじめ、その後の源氏の挙兵にも一切参加せずに、都にあって官僚の道を歩んだ。
sen.e: The brothers did not join the Hogen War, the Heiji War and raising an army by the Minamoto clan, and they lived in Kyoto and spent their lives as bureaucrats.
sen.cmt: 「一原文一訳文の例外対処」the Minamoto clanとし、and追加、didn't joined→did not join、spend→spent、their life→their lives、bureaucracy→bureaucratsに修正しました。
sen.e: The brothers did not join the Hogen War, the Heiji War and raising an army by the Minamoto clan, and they lived in Kyoto and spent their lives as bureaucrats.

sen.j: 地方の長官になっても為義与党としての行動をとらなかった。
sen.e: After Yoshichika was assigned as governor of a province, he didn't cooperated Yoshitomo.
After they were assigned as governor of a province, they did not cooperate with Tameyoshi.
sen.cmt: Yoshichika→they、he→they、didn't cooperated→did not cooperate with、Yoshitomo→Tameyoshiに修正しました。
sen.e: After they were assigned as governor of a province, they did not cooperate with Tameyoshi.

sen.j: また、為義が低い地位で地方の長官にもなれなかった時期にも、他の兄弟は高位につき、長男の源義信は従四位下まで登っている。
sen.e: During the Period, in that Tameyoshi couldn't even be a provincial governor, his brothers were awarded higher position and the first son, MINAMOTO no Yoshinobu got Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).

During the period, in that Tameyoshi could not even be a provincial governor, his brothers were awarded higher position and the first son, MINAMOTO no Yoshinobu got the rank of Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).
sen.cmt: Period→period、couldn't→could no、tgot Jushiinoge→got the rank of Jushiinogeとしました。
sen.e: During the period, in that Tameyoshi could not even be a provincial governor, his brothers were awarded higher position and the first son, MINAMOTO no Yoshinobu got the rank of Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).
